summary: Gives the Dragon Priest dagger and staffs high quality meshes, textures and environmental mapping.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][u][size=4]Dragon Priest Weapons Improved[/size][/u][/b]
By Billyro
[size=1]Version 1[/size][/center]


[b][u]Description[/u][/b]

This mod replaces the Dragon Priest dagger and staffs with high quality textures and high poly meshes with environmental mapping (reflectivity).


[b][u]Installation[/u][/b]

Extract the archive and place the meshes and textures folders in C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\SteamApps\common\Skyrim\Data and overwrite if prompted. 

Alternatively, download with NMM. 


[b][u]Recommended Mod[/u][/b]

I recommend using [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37487/?]aMidianBorn Ebony[/url] alongside this mod. While the armour retexture itself is amazing, CaBaL120's mod also replaces a vanilla cubemap with a much higher quality one - the same cubemap that my mod uses. While the mod isn't a requirement, the Dragon Priest weapons will look a lot nicer if you've installed aMidianBorn Ebony. 


[b][u]Credits[/u][/b]

3ds Max: the program I used to edit the meshes
Paint.NET: the program I used to edit the textures
Nifskope: the program I used to bring it all together
author: Billyro
